IRS990.MissionDesc: CCC PROVIDES PERSON-CENTERED CARE COORDINATION AND TRANSITION SERVICES FOR ELDERS AND INDIVIDUALS WITH DISABILITIES TO HELP ENSURE THEY CAN LIVE SAFELY IN THE PLACE THEY CHOOSE TO LIVE. PEOPLE SERVED EXPERIENCE MULTIPLE CHRONIC CONDITIONS AND REQUIRE DIRECT IN-HOME SERVICES.
IRS990.Desc: CT HOME CARE PROGRAM - MEDICAID WAIVER FUNDED: THROUGH A CONTRACT WITH THE STATE OF CONNECTICUT DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES (DSS), CONNECTICUT COMMUNITY CARE (CCC) PROVIDES THE LONG TERM CARE MANAGEMENT OF HEALTH AND SOCIAL SERVICES FOR CONNECTICUT'S FRAIL ELDERLY TO HELP KEEP THEM OUT OF NURSING HOMES. CLIENTS SERVED FY 18 16,737.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: CT HOME CARE PROGRAM - STATE FUNDED: THROUGH A CONTRACT WITH THE STATE OF CONNECTICUT DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES (DSS), CONNECTICUT COMMUNITY CARE (CCC) PROVIDES THE LONG TERM CARE MANAGEMENT OF HEALTH AND SOCIAL SERVICES FOR CONNECTICUT'S FRAIL ELDERLY TO HELP KEEP THEM OUT OF NURSING HOMES. CLIENTS SERVED FY 18 5,224.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: OTHER PROGRAMS:PROVIDE HEALTH AND SOCIAL SERVICES TO INDIVIDUALS IN NEED, THROUGH PUBLIC GRANTS, PRIVATE GRANTS AND DONATIONS.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART III, LINE 12, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:
Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: MISCELLANEOUS INCOME - 2013 AMOUNT: $ 103,801. 2014 AMOUNT: $ 262,366. 2015 AMOUNT: $ 186,823. 2016 AMOUNT: $ 178,803. 2017 AMOUNT: $ 195,813. PERSONAL SERVICE - 2015 AMOUNT: $ 18,706. 2016 AMOUNT: $ 19,145. 2017 AMOUNT: $ 19,126.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO PROVIDE A PREDICTABLE STREAM OF FUNDING TO THE ORGANIZATION'S PROGRAMS.

THE ORGANIZATION HAS NO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS AT JUNE 30, 2018 AND 2017. THE ORGANIZATION'S FEDERAL AND STATE INFORMATION RETURNS PRIOR TO FISCAL YEAR 2015 ARE CLOSED AND MANAGEMENT CONTINUALLY EVALUATES EXPIRING STATUTES OF LIMITATIONS, AUDITS, PROPOSED SETTLEMENTS, CHANGES IN TAX LAW AND NEW AUTHORITATIVE RULINGS. IF THE ORGANIZATION HAD UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAXES, IT WOULD RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND PENALTIES ASSOCIATED WITH ANY TAX MATTERS AS PART OF THE INCOME TAX PROVISION AND INCLUDE ACCRUED INTEREST AND PENALTIES WITH THE RELATED TAX LIABILITY IN THE STATEMENTS OF FINANCIAL POSITION.
IDENTIFY CHOICES AND PROVIDES SERVICES TO HELP PEOPLE OF ALL AGES, ABILITIES AND INCOME TO LIVE AT HOME.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DATA TO PREPARE FORM 990 IS COMPILED BY MANAGEMENT AND PROVIDED TO INDEPENDENT AUDITORS. THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER REVIEWS THE COMPLETED FORM 990 AND APPROVES FOR FILING. AN ELECTRONIC COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS EMAILED TO BOARD MEMBERS PRIOR TO FILING, SO THAT IT IS READILY AVAILABLE FOR THEIR REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO FILL OUT A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT UPON EMPLOYMENT WITH CCCI. THE STATEMENT IS PART OF THE NEW HIRE PACKET AND IS THEN REVIEWED BY THE DIRECTOR OF HUMAN RESOURCES TO ENSURE THERE ARE NO ISSUES. COMPLIANCE IS MONITORED AND ENFORCED BY PERIODICALLY REQUIRING ALL ACTIVE EMPLOYEES TO UPDATE THE STATEMENT. IN ORDER TO ENSURE COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, ALL CCCI EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO REPORT TO THEIR MANAGER AND HUMAN RESOURCES DEPARTMENT ANY OUTSIDE EMPLOYMENT, ACTIVITIES, AND PRIVATE PRACTICE, OR VOLUNTEER, GOVERNMENT OR TEACHING POSITIONS. ALL EMPLOYEES MUST DO THIS IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN EMPLOYMENT WITH CCCI. MEMBERS OF THE CCCI BOARD OF DIRECTORS COMPLETE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT ONCE THEY HAVE BEEN APPROVED FOR MEMBERSHIP AND THEN ON A YEARLY BASIS AFTER THE SLATE HAS BEEN APPROVED FOR THE UPCOMING YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A REVIEW OF EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION IS MADE BY THE HUMAN RESOURCES DEPARTMENT, WHICH GATHERS EXTERNAL MARKETPLACE DATA FROM VARIOUS SOURCES, INCLUDING CONNECTICUT ASSOCIATION FOR HEALTHCARE AT HOME (CAHCH), CONNECTICUT COMMUNITY NONPROFIT ALLIANCE (THE ALLIANCE), AND OTHERS. SALARY GRADES AND PAY RANGES ARE REVIEWED TO ENSURE THAT THEY ARE COMPETITIVE WITH THE EXTERNAL MARKETPLACE. KEY BENCHMARK JOBS ARE IDENTIFIED AND ASSIGNED A "MARKET ANCHOR" WHICH IS A RATE OF PAY THAT IS APPROXIMATELY THE MIDDLE OF THE MARKET FOR THAT PARTICULAR JOB. SALARY RANGES ARE ESTABLISHED AROUND THE MARKET ANCHORS. THE COMPENSATION DATA IS SUMMARIZED AND REVIEWED FOR APPROVAL BY THE HR COMMITTEE. IT IS THEN REVIEWED FOR APPROVAL BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE WHO PRESENTS THE APPROVED EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION TO THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE FILED WITH THE STATE OF CONNECTICUT OFFICE OF POLICY AND MANAGEMENT AND ARE AVAILABLE UNDER THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT. ALSO, THE CONNECTICUT COMMUNITY CARE, INC. ANNUAL REPORT INCLUDES A NOTATION THAT DETAILED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW UPON REQUEST AT OUR BRISTOL LOCATION. GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT ON INTEREST POLICY ARE ALSO AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW UPON REQUEST.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS A COMMITTEE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AS WELL AS THE SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT.
